modShortDescription: Need something with more comfort than the rough-edged gyrocopter? The MD-500 helicopter should suit you perfectly!
modDescription:
Need something with more comfort than the rough-edged gyrocopter? The MD-500 helicopter should suit you perfectly!

It requires Grease Monkey level 5 to craft.

Has same storage as the gyro, but can carry a total of 4 people.

High fuel consumption, but holds quite a bit.

Speed is set to 25\. Durability is 5k. Has a wide search light.

Does fly a bit odd. Doesn’t have any roll to it, so it can be tricky lining up landings just right.

Like the gyro, “W” is lift, “A” and “D” turn it, “S” makes it fall quicker, “C” rotates the nose down and “Space” rotates the nose up.

## Changelog

Added new engine/horn sounds.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/bdubyah/Mods---A19/tree/master/MD-500)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/bdubyah/Mods---A18/tree/master/MD-500)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/11875-bdubyahs-modlets/).
